data.title: Brookfield Central School District - New York
data.meta_description: Brookfield Central School District is a public school district in New York. They serve  students across 1 school, and its teachers have had one project funded on DonorsChoose.
data.text: Schools in districts that mainly serve students of color receive substantially less state and local support than similar districts that serve primarily White students. Learn more about this gap, why it exists, and how you can help close it.
